Astronomers have recently discovered a black hole closer to the Sun than any other known black hole, at a distance of only 1550 light-years!!! Astronomically speaking, this black hole is ‚Äúpractically in our backyard‚Äùüï≥Ô∏èüåå

photo.alt: This image shows the location of the newly discovered black hole. Astronomers used data from ESA‚Äôs Gaia mission to find it.
